product.name: Storm Stopper – Doormat Welcome Seashell All Weather Heavy Duty Mat 100% Natural Coir Face Non-Slip Outdoor Home Décor Absorbent, Fade Resistant & Pet Friendly 18” x 28”
product.description: Add style to your space with the Creative Home Ideas Natural Coir Doormats. Welcome guests and pets into your home with novelty designs that are a perfect addition to any floor of your home including entryway, garages, outdoor spaces, and more. The mats are printed with high-grade color pigment dyes in a process that is fade resistant, weather resistant, and removes dirt from shoes effortlessly. The innovative printing process keeps the doormats' colors and patterns vibrant season after season. Each doormat measures 18 in. x 28 in. Sturdy non-slip PVC backing helps keep mat securely in place. Mats are strong, pet friendly, and stylish. Face: 100% Natural Coir; Backing: 100% PVC. Easy to clean; Simply brush or shake. Imported.
product.bullet_points:
• PERFECT FOR YOUR ENTRYWAY: Add style to your space with the Storm Stopper All Weather Welcome Natural Coir Doormats. Welcome guests and pets into your home with novelty designs that are a perfect addition to any floor of your home.
• DURABLE MAT: Crafted from 100% Coir, which is an all-natural material made from outer shell of a coconut which makes the mats durable and sustainable coconut fibers that absorb moisture and scrape shoes clean.
• ALL WEATHER, ALL SEASON DOORMAT: The mats are printed with high-grade color pigment dyes in a process that is fade resistant, weather resistant, and removes dirt from shoes effortlessly.
• ANTI-SKID BACKING: Designed to stay where you placed it. The skid and slip resistant backing helps keep the mat firmly in place. Each doormat measures 18 in. x 28 in. Sturdy non-slip PVC backing helps keep mat securely in place. Mats are strong
• CARE INSTRUCTION: Simply clean by shaking, brushing or vacuuming. For a deeper clean, wipe with a damp cloth and mild soap, allow mat to fully air dry before next use; do not use bleach
